question: Which Insurance Company has won the "2017 General Insurance Company of the Year" at the 21st Asia Insurance Industry Awards?
explanation: Apollo Munich Health Insurance Company has won the \" 2017 General Insurance Company of the Year\" award at the 21st Asia Insurance Industry Awards. The Health Insurance Company is a joint venture between Apollo Hospitals Group and the Munich Re Group The award recognises Apollo Munich\'s contribution in demonstrating market leadership during the qualifying period via innovation in products, services, practices, responsiveness to end-users and intermediaries, initiatives in boosting the image of insurance in society, narrowing the protection gap, and showcasing exceptional business growth through professionalism and sound management.
